short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Coulture is designed for rapid wallpaper utilization and saving all kinds of movie

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coulture is a website application where users can get seemliness wallpaper for their devices of all sizes, know bitcoin market price in real-time and as well as search for all sort of movies, save the movie of their choice to watchlist and download somewhere later.  

It is created out of my passion to increase user's experience on sourcing a good mobile wallpaper as well as know the current trend in movie industry and cryptocurrency market (  Bitcoin ).  There would be no need to visit Binance all the time to source for Bitcoin market capitalization!

It is easy to download, customize from your Google and use any day, anytime with unique UI/UX functionality.
